text: When I had left my home, my father, under false pretences, got me in his car and drove home where we were all alone. He was seethed with rage because I withrew from his authority. He hit me, kicked me and threatened me.

label: anger
text: We were starting a student project, and the teacher we talked to was very negative and not very helpful.

label: shame
text: I ride my motorbike in my village and everyone stares at me as if I was a rare specimen.

label: anger
text: When I see how people around me pass by certain unjustice because of indifference or cowardice.

label: sadness
text: The time I lost a badminton match, that I should have won at the Zambia closed badminton championships.

label: fear
text: When I was a child I hid under the sheets out of fear of darkness.

label: sadness
text: When I see children on T.V from areas devastated by drought and war.

label: sadness
text: When I lost my father on the 25th of September,1970.  He died of a sore on the leg.

label: fear
text: I was testing my new roller skates in the street, suddenly a dog ran barking in my direction, very threatening. I was very startled and terribly upset.

label: guilt
text: I got up late and I could not go to my lessons on time.  When I entered the class room the stare of the teacher and my classmates made me feel guilty.

label: anger
text: When others let me down, fail to keep agreements.

label: joy
text: When I got my results - I had passed the form III exams.  I had not expected to do so well.

label: fear
text: An hour before receiving the certificate results I was very frightened.  When I saw others crying I felt very tense and as time went by my fear grew.

label: fear
text: When I had to travel alone, unescorted for the first time.     It was an over-night journey by train to a distant place.

label: guilt
text: When I forgot to take out money for my mother. She asked me what she would do, because I had messed up her program for the following day.

label: fear
text: A friend gave me a lift and we met a road-block.  He tried  to turn back when an officer shouted at us to stop.  My friend took a turn suddenly and the officer raised his gun but by the time we were gone.

label: anger
text: Some foreign students playing loud music before the biology examn.

label: guilt
text: I made an appointment to pick up someone. However I arrived too late and she had to wait a quarter of an hour.

label: anger
text: I got angry when I learned how short a time we had to prepare for the term examinations.

label: disgust
text: Talking to someone I disliked.

label: anger
text: Misunderstood by friends.

label: guilt
text: When I forgot to cook something that my mother had told me to, and at supper time the food that I was supposed to have prepared was not there.

label: anger
text: Someone told me we are not as good as the All English Class.

label: guilt
text: I said nasty things which I did not mean to a friend.

label: shame
text: One day I got on the bus without any money or season ticket and the driver threw me out.

label: joy
text: I had a quarrel with my fiancT. When he admitted his fault, everything was allright. It was then for the first time that he surprised me with coffee and cake and a bunch of flowers.

label: anger
text: Recently a good friend only called me when he needed something. He never said "please" or "thank you" or any other kind word.

label: disgust
text: Finding that a girlfriend of mine was a prostitute and had been seeing many others during our relationship.

label: fear
text: During a football game I made an offence towards an acquaintance. Later on this acquaintance also tackeled me and the game became very rude.

label: fear
text: While he was drunk, my life partner tried to hit me.  I felt scared and fled to the bathroom.

label: fear
text: When I go out alone at night.

label: guilt
text: One day my mother forced me to eat more and I refused, the next day she served me more rice and mutton pieces than usual.  When I saw this I got very angry and scolded her, and refused to eat.  Later I felt guilty and asked her to excuse me.

label: joy
text: When I attended my cousin's 31st birthday.

label: joy
text: Got through first semester University.

label: fear
text: My 80 year old grandfather underwent three successive operations during a single year.  The third operation was risky and I was scared that he would die and feared that my grandmother would be very sad.

label: guilt
text: With a group of handicapped people we went to a party. When we wanted to leave we were not able to find one of these people. I had told his mother that we would leave at 4.30 p.m., actually it was planned for 3.30 p.m. Therefore there was a delay.

label: guilt
text: I lied to one of my best friends.

label: joy
text: Family member survived an operation.

label: anger
text: An unjust refree decision at a sports event when I was the team leader.

label: anger
text: One of my friends went and told another friend of mine that I was going abut with another guy in Lilongwe besides the one I had. She said I was seen with him hand in hand.

label: sadness
text: A person died (not really a friend).

label: joy
text: When my affairs with the girl I love settled positively.

label: disgust
text: My notes were not returned to me, it kept on being procrastinated.

label: disgust
text: When I found out some family friends were embezzelling the company they worked for - using company petrol and food supplies and claiming furniture and crockery.

label: guilt
text: When I betrayed my former girlfriend.

label: guilt
text: I remember when I was a little boy I broke a Swiss dinner set quite involuntarily.

label: disgust
text: A teacher gave me lower grades than I was entitled to, and was hoping for.

label: joy
text: When I was a child, my beloved cat gave birth to four beautiful little kittens. Before she had them, she came up to me and I followed her out, then witnessed them being born.

label: fear
text: That day I was alone at home after coming home from school.  I did not know where everyone else had gone, I kept waiting for them to come back and nobody came.  It was getting very late and I was terrified.

label: shame
text: Was caught stealing apples in a neighbor's garden.

label: shame
text: Several years ago I was caught riding the train without a ticket. The station-mistress treated me like a criminal almost.

label: disgust
text: When I saw all the starving people in Ethiopia on T.V.  It felt awful to see such suffering.

label: sadness
text: A friend of mine, who had repeated a year at school once before, did not pass the final examination and had to take it again half a year later.

label: anger
text: When I was studying in the library - preparing for a test, two people sitting next to me talked to each other for 20 minutes.  There were no other seats so I could not go elsewhere and I did   not want to interrupt them, so I could only be angry in my heart.

label: anger
text: It was at Malawi Army, Dormer Squadron, when some of my workmates got promoted to Seargents (sgts); we were having similar Ranks.

label: shame
text: Failed to recagnize a friend on the street.

label: joy
text: When I took my entrance exams successfully and also when I got my school leaving certificate because the delivering ceremony was extremely official.

label: guilt
text: I was not able to explain well to my good friend to make him less angry.

label: guilt
text: When I did not go to work because I had to study for a midterm.

label: joy
text: Unexpected visit by a close friend, whom I hadn't seen for half a year.

label: shame
text: A friend of mine has not very much money. Therefore, once I stayed with him and his girlfriend, I bought some meat, but nobody wanted to go and prepare it for dinner. My friend said "I thought you wanted to invite us for dinner". "Of course", I said, but I thought by myself that it must have been enough that I had bought it.

label: shame
text: I wore a dirty dress a certain day I was going to town I met an old friend who made a comment about my dress so I felt ashamed.

label: sadness
text: I worked for seven months in a factory, and made friends with a fellow worker.  Later, I visited my former fellow workers and was told that, while in the army, my friend had shot himself.

label: fear
text: Two guys were fighting murderously and I feared that one of them would be killed.

label: disgust
text: When once again I drank too much and felt very rotten the morning after.

label: fear
text: When someone tried to bewitch me and my friends at night.

label: disgust
text: When a member of the family complains about the food that is served, it disgusts me.

label: guilt
text: When I have sometimes been unfair to my parents, when I have happened to deceive them over some trifling things.

label: anger
text: Quarrelled with my younger brother.

label: shame
text: I took my math midterm and got it back the following Wednesday in class. It was a totally low grade.

label: shame
text: I am ashamed of the way my father behaves with my mother and sister, and with me too.

label: shame
text: A few days back I had to ask a professor a ridiculous question because I had lost at a game of cards and had to pay a forfeit.

label: anger
text: A few months ago when I was teaching, I suddenly became very angry at the children and slapped some of them.

label: anger
text: I had an appointment with someone at a certain time. The other person didn't appear.

label: anger
text: When I saw that my bed at the hostel was a mess I guessed that someone else had used my daily necessities.  I felt that my  personal sanity had been affected.

label: guilt
text: I promised my mother to come home on her birthday, but at last I was prevented. Nevertheless it would have been possible to go but I did not.

label: sadness
text: When my boyfriend openly let me down, preferring another girl.

label: sadness
text: A close relative was at odds with a very powerful firm.  All his things had been taken, His dad had died a little before this event.  He gathhered his children and vowed to give them a good life with a new start - the words were hollow, he bit back his tears .....I asked to be excused and then went and cried in the loo.

label: fear
text: When I realized that we are living on borrowed time, and that the nuclear holocaust appears to come closer every day.

label: fear
text: Was threatened with a knife ... in the military by soldiers form another unit. The reason was girls.

label: sadness
text: I separated with the one I liked most.  She refused all my dates and told me that she had dated another one.  My heart seemed to cease beating.  I was silent for some time and then I whispered goodbye and left without turning back.

label: joy
text: After I had been away for a long time a friend told me that I had passed all my written examinations.

label: sadness
text: Death of my father.

label: shame
text: I feared that I would have to describe my sexual life to an older, strange woman.

label: disgust
text: The same event described under FEAR - in the bus a man sat beside me, with his trousers open and holding his penis.

label: anger
text: When a close friend did not write.

label: sadness
text: I had been living in an overseas city and made the decision to leave the city and come home about 12 months before I met a whole new set of friends, leaving them at the airport was sad and traumatic as they had helped me in many ways and I knew I wouldn't see many of them again.

label: joy
text: When I was selected to a University College of Nursing.

label: joy
text: Watching China winning the Asian Olympic games.

label: anger
text: Bad food in the students' dining hall.

label: shame
text: We where in a bar and my friend had a fight with some guys who were in the table aside.

label: fear
text: After some time of work I was transferred to another place and in an other quite harder job.

label: guilt
text: While travelling in a bus with an invalid ticket, I got caught.

label: disgust
text: During my birthday party a friend drank too much alcohol. So much that he had to throw up. Worst of all was that he couldn't leave my friend alone and that he was molesting her.

label: disgust
text: T.V features showing the violation of defenceless people.

label: anger
text: While having a discussion with my mother, I realized that she does not for a moment doubt the justification of her making the decisions concerning my life.

label: shame
text: I was given the task to learn a page of music text for a small part. But I had forgotten all about it and I felt quite awkward when I had to show what I had prepared.

label: shame
text: We were discussing a subject ( I knew very little about it) and I was holding my ground.  They showed me that I was wrong.

label: disgust
text: I came across a woman in town who was very drunk.  She was swearing at everyone and carried on drinking even though she could hardly stand.

label: shame
text: I was drinking a glass of wine and eating something when there suddenly appeared pictures about the famine in some parts of Africa.

label: shame
text: My father insulted by other people.

label: disgust
text: Despite my being affectionate, sincere, and helpful to close  relatives of mine; they turned around and accused me of being inconsiderate in my relationship with them.

label: guilt
text: A very close friend of mine invited me to spend the holidays with him.  He was very kind, good and understanding.  However it turned out that he had two of his cousins at his place.  He, however gave me everything I needed - even transport money.

label: anger
text: Having my personal objects rearranged by someone else without my consent and having it arranged to their taste. Then trying to find a particular object they rearranged for an hour or more.

label: shame
text: After the car accident in GUILT.

label: anger
text: I wanted to clear up a misunderstanding with a friend that I had caused. A third person meddled in our conversation, turned my efforts to ridicule so that I did not succeed in what I had intended.

label: sadness
text: I made a long-distance call to people rather close to me and I thought about the sad incident that had happened to them in the near past; I knew that they were thinking about it too when I made the call.

label: anger
text: When my boss enrolled in a course to satisfy his own ends - to trample on his associates.  I have the misfortune to have one of my superiors in my course.

label: disgust
text: Bus driver driving roughly - old man fell off seat into aisle - driver wouldn't stop - disgusted with her behaviour.

label: joy
text: When I won the best prize in the National science fair.

label: guilt
text: My daughter was a baby and was crying to be taken on my lap. I felt very nervous and moved her away and went out. As soon as the feeling of nervousness passed I was taken by an enormous feeling of guilt, for having rejected my daughter.

label: joy
text: When my father married a certain lady. The reception was held at Kasungu town Hall.

label: fear
text: I had an important amount of money with me and felt fear of being assaulted.

label: fear
text: At the railway station, while waiting for the last train at night I noticed that a drunk young man was appraching me in a purposeful mannner.

label: fear
text: One evening, while going to meet a friend of mine, I had to cross a meadow by a dark road.  There were bushes on the other side of the road.  The weather was damp and a bit foggy.  I heard steps behind me and kept speeding up my steps all the time.

label: shame
text: A friend of mine was shouting at me in a group of juniors.

label: joy
text: Helping in the nursery school.

label: shame
text: Sleeping with a girl on a Saturday night and then not contacting her in later days.

label: fear
text: I turned the knob of my granny's two band radio and did not hear any broadcast,  " What ! Have I broken the knob ? How much does it cost ? What if the spare part is not available ? "  --I did not know how to tune a radio.

label: sadness
text: My sister marrying a bad man. He is cruel to her.

label: fear
text: I was raped once when I went through a dark alley at the back of our house. The man pushed me in the bushes. I fought back and succeeded to escape.

label: shame
text: I wanted my boyfriend to stay when he didn't. He stayed but when he left I felt ashamed because I should have let him leave when he wanted. I was too selfish.

label: sadness
text: A friend's brother died.

label: fear
text: I was on the Inter Rail in Naples alone. After an evening in a restaurant I was going back to the hotel when a prostitute approached me to sell herself. I refused but as I carried on walking I felt that I was being followed by someone.

label: anger
text: I was told to do something I did not want to do.

label: anger
text: A nuisance used to live in our flat a month ago. I experienced this feeling when I tried to chase her out.

label: anger
text: An incident occurred to me when I was going home with my girlfriend. On the way, a man named Banda grabbed my girlfriend in my presence. I was really angry with him and as a result I threw stones at him and he ran away.

label: sadness
text: I got separated form my closest friend. He went to work abroad.

label: fear
text: Almost crashing into the back of a car while driving along the motorway on my motorcycle.

label: fear
text: Before an exam in logics.

label: fear
text: It was more that fear - anguish -that I felt before my last exam.

label: fear
text: A film on zombies.

label: guilt
text: I angered a close friend and he was injured.

label: fear
text: Assaulted by drunken neighbour.

label: sadness
text: When my studies are too demanding and I cannot cope with it.

label: anger
text: My boyfriend promised to take me to see a game of tennis and rang saying he was going to the pub with some of his friends instead.

label: anger
text: My car had been towed away by the traffic police because it had been wrongly parked.  However the sign had been put up only after I had already parked.

label: guilt
text: Getting a D in a class last semester and knowing it was because I didn't study.

label: sadness
text: I could not meet my love, after having waited for a month, due to illness.

label: sadness
text: When a close friend drowned in the American River.

label: fear
text: I was driving very fast on a small road and I met an oncoming car in a right handed bend.  The other driver was on his own side of the road and I had to skid out of it to avoid a collision.  It was dark.

label: guilt
text: Car accident, hurt three of my closest family.

label: joy
text: In Southern Tyrol, I was gathering apples, it was a fine day, I was not thinking about anything, I felt an overwhelming joy.

label: sadness
text: My mother was unwell and went for many cancer tests. She spent time in hospital being opened and closed many times.

label: fear
text: One day when I was a little boy, my friends asked me to play with them outside and to catch some boys.  However our parents did not know that we were out and when I got home it was very late and I feared being scolded by my parents.

label: disgust
text: A too eager approach by a dirty drunken person in a bus.

label: anger
text: When my boss cut off my vacations saying that in that month it wouldn't be possible, and after some time he let another girl take vacations that month. The anger was because of the resentment. Resulting from our bad relationship.

label: sadness
text: When the grandmother of my friend died in a hospital. My friend was crying and I was sad, too.

label: anger
text: When I was robbed in a bus.

label: sadness
text: The death of my father.

label: guilt
text: When an event took place in another's life and which I thought I could have avoided.

label: anger
text: I was walking on a street alone in the afternoon when there were not too many people on the street.  A couple of guys were following me and I was ignoring them.  Suddenly one of them came in front of me and started using dirty language and harrassing me.  I got very angry and wanted to strike back at them.

label: disgust
text: I was stopped from entering a party while I was at School but I had an Invitation card with me. This was done because they said I was too young to join elderly people.

label: shame
text: I was really shameful when my mother beat me in the presence of my friends because I didn't cook lunch up until 2 o'clock.

label: anger
text: At the hardware store, trying to convert Imperial to Metric measurements, I made a mistake, and didn't buy enough tiles for the bathroom. I was angry at myself, because I hope to be a Maths teacher.

label: disgust
text: Pictures of Nazi extermination camps on a T.V program.

label: disgust
text: At work when I did not get the full co-operation of my colleagues to complete an assignment.

label: joy
text: When I won an unexpected sum of money.

label: joy
text: I had stayed for months without seeing mother because our holidays were short and my home is far. Some times, mother came to see me at school, I was very joyful, and I didn't want her to go.

label: fear
text: I was alone at home, in bed reading a womens' magazine in which there were storiees of paranormal experiences.  My leg was itching and I stretched my hand to scratch and I felt another strange hand. (later I realized that it was the corner of the blanket)

label: sadness
text: I was to meet a girl in a discotheque.  She was very pretty and I was very happy.  But she did not turn up.  Thank God, there were some other friends there and I was able to have a more or less good time.

label: shame
text: When I failed some tests my first year at CAL.

label: anger
text: A member of a religious sect tried to convert me, using really evil tricks to persuade me.  After he had left, I was anxious and angry for a long time. After the event, I was alone.

label: joy
text: When my girl told me that she loved me more than any male creature on earth and that I would be the only one in her heart for all her life.

label: disgust
text: The teacher of one course gave me 10 questions with sub-questions going from a to e for each question.  She asked me to do all this in one and a half hours.  It involved a lot of describing and explaining and even though I knew all the answers, I could not finish the work.

label: guilt
text: One of my friends came to know through some other friends that I   had applied for some course in an institute.  He asked me "why did not you tell me, I would also have applied."  At that I felt guilty.

label: shame
text: When I embarrassed a friend by asking him aloud if a certain person was "the source of gossip" he told me about, while that person was also present.

label: joy
text: Winning a race that I had been training for, for many weeks. (Running Race).

label: disgust
text: Some boys not cueing in the dining hall.

label: shame
text: When I made the same mistake that I had accused someone else of, and this was obvious to a third pereson.

label: anger
text: When a professor of this faculty laughed at, and was suspicious of a composition written by a class-mate and me.

label: disgust
text: At school a classmate who was a very good pupil had to help another boy who performed less well. He told him on purpose the wrong things so that he had to repeat a year.

label: anger
text: A male, Honduran acquaintance of mine despised my opinions.

label: shame
text: Not quick enough to help the lectors to catty things for the lecture.

label: disgust
text: I was disgusted with the hypocrisy of my colleagues from the group.

label: sadness
text: My parents told me that they do not like my friend.

label: fear
text: There was a scene of shooting in front of my house, I was very afraid. Two armed men confronting. I didn't discover the reason of the incident.

label: joy
text: When I was selected to the university of Zambia.

label: sadness
text: This occurred when my girlfriend and I have to finish our relationship due to some circumstances between her and her family. I was really sad, hurt and couldn't really find any reason why am I still living. Is this life is all about ? This was one of few question which crept up vividly every time I thought about what had happened.

label: sadness
text: When a very close friend of mine went into hospital for a major operation and I couldn't see her for a while as I was not a relative she had no relatives in N.Z.

label: shame
text: When dropping a carton of boiling soup onto a co-worker's leg - causing great pain, and for me, severe embarassment at my own ineptitude, and shame that another person suffered as a result.

label: disgust
text: I am disgusted with the behavior of a car driver whose car would run over me and my friends during our autumn brigade.

label: anger
text: I felt angry when my friend told me that I had stolen her money.

label: sadness
text: I realized that the girl I loved had to leave me.

label: fear
text: When I came home late one day. I was afraid I would be shouted at by my parents.

label: shame
text: My son was apprehended for shoplifting at the age of 14. Because I too had been apprehended at the same age I felt the shame of not having been able to prevent my son from acting in the same way.

label: joy
text: When, after a long time, I saw a girl with whom I was in love.

label: shame
text: I forgot that the course instructor had directed us to go for special classes after the usual class hours.  I missed this the first day and when he asked me about it the next day I said that I had forgotten.

label: anger
text: When a discussion resulted in an insult, which in my opinion, was not justified.

label: sadness
text: My mother unjustly became very angry with me and sent me to my room while my father explained that the way she saw things was not correct. I had done things with the best intentions.

label: anger
text: When, for example, I was not approved to continue my studies at the Moscow University, no matter that I had the highest marks and in general the best records of all the candidates.

label: guilt
text: When my friend failed an exam by just one mark.  During this exam she had asked me to show her my answer sheet and I had not done it.  When the results came out, I thought that had I shown her my answer sheet she would have passed the exam.  I felt guilty as I had failed her.

label: sadness
text: When my girl went away for a holiday without saying good-bye to me.

label: guilt
text: When I cheated my father about the book allowance at university.  He discovered that we were given K150 per year for books.

label: fear
text: Once when I was walking alone at mid-night, I happened to put my foot on a frog, as it felt smooth I thought that it was a snake  and I felt afraid.

label: guilt
text: At work a boy was injured because of my lack of supervision.

label: fear
text: Last night, I dreamt that things that looked like monsters were trying to kiss me.

label: anger
text: When they threw my holder down on the floor, with all my notes for an exam inside it and they got all mixed up.

label: disgust
text: When I see dead dogs on the road.

label: sadness
text: When my girlfriend's nephew passed away.

label: sadness
text: When my brother (5th in the family) passed away.

label: sadness
text: When I was 9 years old, I got a cat, but after 3 days he died. I was very sad, because I had nursed him and taken him to the veterinary's - but in vain. Although I had had him only for a short time I had liked him very much.

label: shame
text: In a school parting we agreed to go to a restaurant. We met at school and we separated us in several cars. My car broke and we arrived late. All those who already had arrived stand up and applauded us when we entered two hours late. All the restaurant attention was turned on us.

label: anger
text: When I tried to put up a tent some years ago, I was teased and hindered by my cousin.

label: sadness
text: My old teacher in primary school died.

label: joy
text: I felt happy when I saw my brother at the bus depot after 3 months without seing each other.

label: sadness
text: When I saw the film "Johnny got his gun" which deals with the consequences of the Vietnam war.

label: joy
text: An invitation to spend 5 days at the seaside with all expenses paid.

label: joy
text: At a party, on New Year's Eve, I met on old friend whom I had not seen for some time

label: joy
text: When I was admitted to the Sofia University.

label: fear
text: A workmate and I had been antagonistic with each other for some weeks - he had reacted violently to my criticisms of his work standards.

label: sadness
text: When boyfriend could not stand up to his mother or for himself.

label: fear
text: When a big angry dog put its snout on my arm and had I made one movement it would have bitten me.

label: shame
text: I cried for 3 hours because I felt very miserable. Then I called my boyfriend and he said lovely things to me. After this feeling disappeared I felt ashamed.

label: shame
text: My girlfriend had started going around with another boy.  Her cousin, also a friend of mine, asked her as to who she preferred.  Both of us were present and she chose the other guy.

label: disgust
text: A few days back I was waiting for the bus at the bus stop.  Before getting into the bus I had prepared the exact amount of coins to pay for the bus fair and when I got into the bus I put these coins into the box meant to collect the bus fair.  I thought that I had paid and wanted to get inside.  However the bus driver called me and asked me in an impolite way if the coins were stuck at the opening  of the box.  He had not seen me paying and there wasn't a stack of coins in the box.  I could not understand this and the driver kept questioning me.  He made me feel angry and at last i inserted a dollar coin in the box just to get away from him.  Later I found that I had forgotten a few coins in my pocket and had not paid enough for the fair the first time.  After I had entered the bus I could still hear him scolding me and I felt disgusted.

label: shame
text: When my dad caught me with a honey (girlfriend) in my bedroom.

label: joy
text: Success in university entrance examination.

label: guilt
text: For the above: guilt at not living up to my own moral expectation, guilt for not being the type of person my patents wanted, guilt for just about bloody everything, just realising that I have failed drastically in my own eyes.

label: joy
text: When I was told that I could take a week off and go for a trip with my friends.

label: joy
text: Finding my glasses again after having lost them in town.

label: disgust
text: Cueing for bath for a long time.

label: disgust
text: Watching an alcoholic woman who was approaching everyone at the wharf for cigarettes - a prostitute in Auckland (elderly).

label: sadness
text: I quarrelled with my younger sister because I had said something against her boyfriend.  Consequently she looked through me when she saw me as she thought that I was trying to separate them.  She had misunderstood me.

label: sadness
text: One night I was called and told that the father of a close friend died. When I visited my friend at home and when attending the funeral I felt very sad.

label: disgust
text: I was driving along and saw this young guy urinating into the gutter, in broad daylight.

label: shame
text: I was amongst a group of people talking about how the Maori people were stirrers and causing trouble in our country. I felt shame to be a pakeha when other pakehas had such narrow conservative views.

label: disgust
text: Ever since I have been a child, the sight of any kind of wound.

label: shame
text: Comments from other children on my alcoholic father

label: fear
text: Before I went to the urologist's I was afraid for several reasons: because it was for the first time, because the medical check-up might be painful, because of the uncertainty and because someone had informed me about it.

label: anger
text: During an argument between friends, one of them accused me of taking advantage of some other friends who usually come to the university in my car, saying that I ask them too much money for the petrol.

label: sadness
text: A friend of mine who was driving a car ahead of me died in a car accident.

label: joy
text: Talking to my close friend.

label: anger
text: I got angry with a stranger in a train who behaved impertinently and immorally

label: guilt
text: During a discussion I reacted very aggressively and so I made it impossible to continue discussing.

label: disgust
text: I was reading in the paper the feature on Henry Lucas who claims to have killed 380 people. He was a recreational killer and a necrophiliac and zoophiliac. He has raped and beaten many women and killed men too.

label: disgust
text: When I failed the  grade 7 exams.

label: shame
text: A few years back I had proposed love to a girl who later turned out to be related to me.  Though we were in love with each other, we both felt ashamed and withdrew from each other.

label: anger
text: When I received the mark well above requirements for the course I wanted to enter, yet I was not accepted - anger at the injustice of it, because I didn't receive early release of H.S.C. marks.

label: shame
text: I saw a skid-row (chronical) alcoholic and I was ashamed of the people with a high standard of living.

label: sadness
text: When I crashed my car and it had to be scrapped then.  It was my fault and I feel depressed as I miss the car.

label: joy
text: When I went to the pub with a large group of friends, we drank and danced.

label: disgust
text: Sort of awkward. I'd introduced (a lover) but introduced as a friend to some members of my family, and my niece Yavanna who's six was home from school and at Mum's and Dad's and was really silly and at first it was ok, but it went on and on - yukky pooh! You eat your snot, etc. and I felt cross she wouldn't stop. But she had an audience and was in one of those moods. Once I'd accepted it was something everyone does at time I felt better - it was partly having my friend there.

label: disgust
text: Once when I was studying for my examination, I was asked to do some work which was unavoidable.

label: sadness
text: My mother's death.

label: anger
text: When I was deputy manager during the Summer, certain deputies took liberties, more than what was normal.

label: sadness
text: It was when I failed standard 8 exams while all my friends passed and went to secondary school. In class I was always getting more marks than they did.

label: sadness
text: I put in two years of hard work and it was neither looked at nor appreciated.

label: fear
text: Finding myself alone in a public toilet block with a man known to have had great psychological disturbances.

label: joy
text: I didn't like my former fob and felt joy when I received a telegram offering me a new one that I though better and for which I had been waiting.

label: guilt
text: My girlfriend's results in school had become worse because I prevented her from learning (we often went out etc.).

label: sadness
text: When my girlfriend was afraid and anxious the day before taking her exam.

label: joy
text: When I had achieved a goal indirectly. I work for CAL Football and our 2nd win of the season was very gratifying and brought our joy because of the hard work involved and the fact that no one expected we would win.

label: sadness
text: When my wife died in hospital, she was pregnant and had undergone an operation.

label: sadness
text: My best friend got married and left her home-town to go and live in Poona.  After her wedding I felt sad.

label: joy
text: When I was selected to start Form I at Chilumba Secondary School out of the 100 pupils I was among the 4 who were successful. Family History showed that I had done better than all my brothers who had passed after repeating for several times.

label: joy
text: When my boyfriend came form Rumphi to Lilongwe for a visit I was very happy to see him and couldn't believe it was him with me.

label: disgust
text: I was looking after a dying patient at work one night, a young woman, my colleague was talking to her relatives and .... to offer them any support emotionally, physically and then sent them down to the coffee shop to have a dinner rather than offering the facilities available for their use cause it involved her having to do some work. Seeing them again I felt disgusted at her attitude.

label: shame
text: A few months back I had gone to my friend's place and they offered me tea and coffee.  I do not have the habit of drinking tea or coffee and so they offered me a glass of milk instead, so I felt ashamed.

label: disgust
text: In a study group, a person always liked to argue on some unimportant, irrelevant and minor points.  He tried to persuade    others in an unfriendly way.  He was obstinate and would not accept  other's point of view.

label: joy
text: Found out my wife (girl-friend?) pregnant.

label: disgust
text: I felt disgusted while studying for my applied psychology and mental testing papers in B.A.

label: shame
text: I travelled on a bus and I forgot to punch the ticket. A ticket collector came in and I had to pay the fine. I did it with a feeling of shame.

label: shame
text: A friend catched me while masturbating. I am not fully sure whether she saw it or not.

label: shame
text: Put down by my father - at a family outing at mutual family friends dinner. Told "Not to Speak". The attitude by him was negative/I was in mid 20s, I had done many things - a wide range of experiences. Probably greater than he.

label: sadness
text: A person I really like left for overseas for a few months, I had hoped to go out with her soon.

label: joy
text: My old boyfriend - yes the same one - asked me out. We had a good time. Then he asked me out the following week. He actually took interest.

label: fear
text: Waiting for a taxi - when within 1/2 an hour two separate people challenged me to fight for no apparent reason except they were drunk.

label: anger
text: A honest "sliding" on the part of a girlfriend of mine. Terribly crossed I started breaking things and tearing books.

label: fear
text: When my mother entered surgery for a quadruple heart bypass. I felt intense fear at the time she was actually wheeled away.

label: sadness
text: On rising. No apparent reason.

label: fear
text: In the real sense of the word I experienced fear in my first months in the army. During my first night of duty. The cause for all this was a bear. I became panic sticken (may be for the first time) and even forgot that I had a gun.

label: disgust
text: In the morning, the cat of my landlady had vomited on the floor, near the staircase I take to go to the bathroom.

label: disgust
text: Grovelling people.

label: sadness
text: Leaving the house myself and a female friend had shared for 6-8 months because of the friendship which developed and our approach to each other in occasional instances of several personal crises.

label: fear
text: I was in a train where a fight occurred. One person who was there opened his handbag and took out a gun, another who fought too looked among his things for a weapon to fight.

label: fear
text: I live outside Graz - so I have to go by bus. One day I went home from the bus stop alone. It was dark, I had to go through a forest and there was a dark figure behind me. I was very frightened.

label: shame
text: I fell off a bike in the presence of a lot of people.

label: guilt
text: One day I found an incontinent man in the ward. This patient had a guardian who couldn't give him a bath. So I just left him like that but felt guilty until I went back to give him a bath.

label: anger
text: When I saw a car run over a child, out of carelessness.

label: disgust
text: When I was taking my girlfriend out, she seemed to have taken her time.

label: disgust
text: Class leader told me to collect homework for him.

label: fear
text: One day during our clinical practices, we had a very ill patient. Unfortunately the patient passed away. I had seen him dying and it was the first experience. During the night I became afraid fearing the dead body.

label: anger
text: I was angry when my boyfriend did not turn up as promised.

label: disgust
text: When one finds out that someone you know is not at all like one had thought, for instance friends who steal and things like that, quite unwarranted.

label: anger
text: When my boyfriend went away for a month long holiday without me.

label: fear
text: Walking out from the biology building.

label: anger
text: I was with my family and we found some abandoned puppies.  I wanted to help them but everyone said no.  We then left.

label: sadness
text: My mother was stuck by an apoplectic fit, was hemi-paralyzed and suffered an aphasia.

label: fear
text: I was diving below the ice, in a cave, at a depth of 26 metres.  Visibility was almost zero and the oxygen level decreased threateningly.  There were three of us divers on one safety rope.

label: sadness
text: After hearing the news about the death of my sister, I felt very sad.

label: joy
text: A person whom I had not seen for a long time called me and invited me for a party.

label: fear
text: A fall during a climb, with almost with no previous experience.

label: sadness
text: I heard that a friend had died in an accident; group situation: suddenly a friend came in and said "Have you already heard that..."; there was a terrible consternation, silence, then everybody shouted excitedly "How could that happen...".

label: anger
text: My younger brother destroyed and gave away some of the books that I had intended to keep for as long as possible.

label: disgust
text: When I heard about the way a parent of a friend had mistreated him, and caused a great instability.

label: anger
text: Being insulted by my roommate (she is in the English Class).

label: fear
text:
My friend started to misunderstand and hurt me.
disgust,"It was when I drunk urine during my childhood thinking it was water. My friend had urinated in the tin.

label: joy
text: I was filled with joy when I heard that I had passed my Secondary school leaving certificate exam.

label: anger
text: The sight of a man who ran amok (fighting) at a dance.

label: guilt
text: Did not return the library book on time.

label: fear
text: Once late at night (around midnight) a person asked me to give him a lift. He suddenly tried to attack me but I could escape. After this he followed me for a little while.

label: sadness
text: My mother was working with a knife and we were all laughing heartily.  She was not able to control the knife and stuck it deep into her hand.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty when I "stole" the boyfriend of a friend of mine.

label: shame
text: Some weeks ago I experienced a day that everything went wrong I broke several things I felt very ashamed for I am not a sloven.

label: sadness
text: When I heard that my father had passed away.

label: sadness
text: My elder sister scolded me in front of my younger sisters and cousins.  She said that I was very lazy and I felt so sad that I cried myself to sleep.

label: shame
text: When I promised to help a friend over a weekend and did not keep the promise.

label: fear
text: When I saw a ghost.

label: fear
text: When we could not land our plane and we knew that the fuel was running out.  Bad weather had already frightened us.

label: joy
text: After my graduation exams I was waiting to get admitted to a post graduation course, however the situation was not very favourable for me and I was upset.  Suddenly, Bombay university offered me a seat and I landed up in Bombay for my post graduation studies.  This happened last year and was very pleasant for me.

label: shame
text: I can not think of any incident when I have felt very ashamed.  There are small incidents that I am ashamed of, for instance, not sending money to the children in Ethiopia.

label: disgust
text: When I patronized a certain tavern which had prostitutes, it was almost a brothel.

label: anger
text: My intimate girlfriend told me that her father was opposed to our relationship  and had insulted my integrity.

label: sadness
text: When I learned that two of my friends had had a serious car accident.

label: shame
text: When I was tired and unmotivated, I shouted at my girlfriend and and brought up negative sides of her character which are actually not so important.

label: sadness
text: One of my relatives became seriously ill. I felt sad because I didn't know if she will ever be the same again.

label: sadness
text: When my grandfather died. When I heard about his death, I had a bad feeling in my stomach and I felt as if I had lost something very precious.

label: sadness
text: Death of my father; he died of laryngeal cancer.

label: fear
text: I was walking in the wood at night with my boyfriend. Very romantic. Suddenly I heard a car driving very slowly with the lights out, it looked as if they were looking for something.

label: sadness
text: Realizing that school will soon be over, and we will all go different ways, perhaps never meeting again our friends from this year.

label: sadness
text: When my dad gives priority to my kid brother's band and his other activities.  We both play in different bands and rehearse in my parents garage.

label: anger
text: I had got a bad cold. My father said I must be crazy to go by motorbike at those temperatures. When I answered him that I did not care about a cold, he said that if I did not care for anything I could leave him (it was for the second time he said something like that).

label: anger
text: I wanted to go to a friend of mine who had a party; at the moment I wanted to leave, my father said I couldn't go because he needed me for some work in the afternoon.

label: anger
text: I had an argument with my mother because I criticized the rules she imposes at home, which are too rigid and arbitrary for me.

label: fear
text: I was at home alone, and heard noises on the roof, and doorknobs, and drawers.

label: anger
text: Once a person in authority (school teacher) was telling blatant lies about me and the headmistress would not let me defend myself. She was also telling lies about other members of my family.

label: joy
text: When I was accepted for further education, here at the university.

label: anger
text: When I learnt that a friend of mine had talked about me to another friend and had said wrong things about my abilities and attitudes.  I was very angry.

label: sadness
text: A child, 9 years old, died in a stupid way.  He fell from a place which was 1 metre high.

label: disgust
text: When I was walking in a field which had a lot of manure.

label: shame
text: I am ashamed of the horrible way I used to treat my little sister.

label: guilt
text: On Reberbahn, I was in a "restaurant" where drinks were overpriced.  I did not ask for the prices beforehand, and when the bill came I could not pay the bill.

label: disgust
text: A man was unfair to a girlfriend of mine.

label: joy
text: I received money from my father at a time when I was completely broken.

label: disgust
text: At school, I detested the spinach gruel which had lumps of flour in it.

label: guilt
text: Once I had some homework to do and I did not do it.

label: joy
text: Did well in an examn just before my father's birthday: the best present I can give to my father.

label: sadness
text: My best friend was not chosen for the English lectures.

label: shame
text: When I was on holiday with my former boyfriend, he hit me and behaved in a very evil and ugly manner in front of the hotel personnel.

label: guilt
text: The negative feelings towards me displayed by my "parents-in-law".

label: fear
text: Being very close to having an auto accident, almost driving off the road.

label: shame
text: I was ashamed when a certain friend of mine I used to move with failed to propose to a lady yet we always said to ourselves no lady can refuse our proposal.

label: guilt
text: When I deliberately engineered a situation to cause tension between friends so as to bolster the impression one of them had of me !

label: anger
text: My friend misunderstood me.

label: fear
text: The night before my wife had given birth to our twins. I felt fear in the hospital yard, I feared if everything was going to be in order.

label: anger
text: When I used to go to my chief asking about any doubt about the job and he didn't care, didn't answer me, leaving me speaking alone.

label: sadness
text: This issue worried me rather than saddening me.  In mid September I went to Guanggho alone.  I was looking for an accomodation in the evening and after having walked 2 or 3 miles I still could not find anything.  What could I do?  I was not worried about sleeping on the streets but because of some procedural problems.  I finally found a place to sleep at 8 o'clock.

label: joy
text: After my girl and I talked things over our relationship changed and became positive.  A diificult time turned into pleasant one.

label: fear
text: When I went to my first dental appointment.

label: anger
text: I arrived in Vienna in the middle of the night. I asked for some silly information - as I realized myself afterwards - and the inquiry  clerk reacted in a very arrogant manner.

label: guilt
text: I do not have the time for other people's problems.  My mother-in-law is sometimes depressed and I do not have the time, the desire or the strength to help.

label: joy
text: Felt joy a few years ago when I was away on holiday. And sat very close to my best friend looking straight into the eyes.

label: sadness
text: A woman I know is slowly dying from cancer. Observing this process makes me sad.

label: disgust
text: Seeing maltreated, dead animals.

label: disgust
text: I had to wash my grandmother because she did not get to the bathroom on time.

label: anger
text: Once when I was playing table tennis I was already sure that I would win , but at last I lost the game.

label: shame
text: When I could not pass my exams with good marks.  My wedding was to take place 15 days after the exams and I tried to convince myself that this was the reason for my not having done well.   However, I thought that had I really put my mind to doing well at the exams I would have done well.

label: shame
text: Not being able to argue against class leaders.

label: disgust
text: I feel disgusted with toadies, hypocrites, chameleons.

label: anger
text: I told my friend something confidential which was supposed to remain between the two of us.  The next thing that happened was that a girl who is not even close to us came laughing and askad me to tell her about it.  I was very angry with my friend as I had trusted her.

label: joy
text: The last time I had sex.

label: disgust
text: I hate the behaviour of my so called friends, they use bad language, spit, boast and treat the youngsters badly.

label: disgust
text: Saw someone who picked up a cigarette from the floor and smoked it.

label: anger
text: Following an argument with my brother, he broke my golf clubs.

label: anger
text: When you are unjustly assessed at something you are sure to have been right.

label: joy
text: Third highest grade in the class and the best answer given for one question (the question was graded by the professor and he indicated he liked my answer).

label: guilt
text: I didn't visit a very close friend at the hospital and some days later he died.

label: sadness
text: I felt very lonely, was very dissatisfied with myself when I realised that I could feel very jealous of other women because of my boyfriend.

label: disgust
text: When other people refuse to do their house jobs and give the work to someone else.

label: disgust
text: When I found out how the people of Ethiopia were starving and their government was spending millions on celebrating being in power so many years. Then I saw all these people on TV needing food, etc.

label: disgust
text: When my grandmother came to stay with us permanently as she is a very difficult person to stay with and when she started telling false stories about us to other people.

label: guilt
text: A young girl tried to put an end to her life because of lover's grief; not until she was in hospital I heard that I had been the reason for her action.

label: guilt
text: When as a 7 year old, I stole money from my mother.

label: joy
text: That afternoon I rushed home to look at the result slip of the higher level as fast as possible.  I opened the envelope very carefully and found that my results were much better than I had expected and thus I could enter the Chinese university.  My diligence had paid and I was very happy.

label: sadness
text: I felt it when I was at home and saw a discussion without sense between my parents.

label: anger
text: Last night - finding that someone in the house had eaten an entire packet of almonds I had bought for a family treat.

label: anger
text: In a confrontation with a person, he provoked me several times till I reacted in an angry way.  Fortunately there were no disastrous consequences.

label: fear
text: Many years ago I saw the film "Psycho" by Hitchcock for the first time. When I saw the film I was alone and afterwards I hardly dared to go to bed and hardly was able to sleep.

label: fear
text: At noon one Sunday I received a phone call telling me that my mother had been knocked down by a car at the street crossing and that her husband should go and see her.  I could not believe this as my father and my mother had gone out together to buy lunch boxes.  However I immediately ran to the scene of the accident.

label: disgust
text: Hearing of a filthy situation over the phone.

label: sadness
text: A younger brother of a good friend of mine died (asthma).

label: anger
text: A friend of mine promised to come with me to the cinema but he didn't come.

label: anger
text: A drummer who had borrowed my drums destroyed both the drumskin and the sticks.  He did not repair them nor did he tell me about it.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty when I lied to my parents.

label: anger
text: After a hard day at the university I also had to make dinner that evening. It failed because of a frying pan which broke.

label: sadness
text: I had to leave my girlfriend for 4 weeks because of my studies. This happens frequently. The last 24 hours before my departure are always very depressing.

label: disgust
text: When my father shouted at me for going to a party with my sister.

label: disgust
text: In a film there was a scene in which a rat was sliding on a bed, leaving a trace of blood behind, finally it entered the mouth of one of the actors.

label: joy
text: My father promoted to be a professor.

label: guilt
text: Failure to complete medical course as a result of failing fourth year twice.

label: sadness
text: A friend misunderstood me.

label: sadness
text: After some friends had come to see me. They had stayed for several days and we had got on very well. When they had left, I had a feeling of emptyness.

label: sadness
text: When I heard that my friend had started drinking beer.

label: joy
text: When my children were born.

label: joy
text: When my father was saved from a severe work accident.

label: fear
text: When a friend of mine discussed with me, I felt fear of losing her. This occurred because we had a missunderstanding between mutual colleagues.

label: anger
text: Falling in love although she is my friend (angry with myself).

label: anger
text: During a dance someone slashed my tires and dumped paint on my car. I had four other friends with me that I drove and furthermore it was raining.

label: shame
text: I had been away all night without having told my parents about it.  In the morning when I came home, my mother looked tired.  She said that she had been awake all night because of me and that she was angry and disappointed.

label: guilt
text: Facing the possibility of having a child when it wasn't either desired or permitted.

label: sadness
text: A friend breaking up with her boyfriend.

label: shame
text: I slipped on butter one evening in the Dining Commons landed on my rear causing my tray also to land on the floor.

label: sadness
text: I was sad to hear that my brother had a motorbike accident.

label: shame
text: This was when one of the Clinical officers scolded us in the hospital on how to make beds but we did not deserve to be scolded.

label: anger
text: When I was at S.Y.Bajaj I wanted to get admission in another college and this was not easy and I felt angry.

label: anger
text: When one teacher unjustly gave me zero in a test saying that I was cribbing.

label: joy
text: When I gave birth to my son and saw that he was alive and that I had managed it well.  He was born a month too early with a malfunctioning lung.  This happened a year ago.

label: guilt
text: I used to pinch change from my father's mantlepiece (never my mother - she didn't get enough housekeeping) and then I'd feel when we went to church as a family I'd felt awkward cos I felt I'm expected to go to communion and I would but I was afraid and guilty 'cos I committed a mortal sin.

label: guilt
text: Not acting on my promise.

label: guilt
text: My parents appreciate very much me and my boyfriend coming and have dinner with them at Christmas. However we decided to visit his parents. My mother was rather disappointed.

label: anger
text: When I first saw a person begging.

label: disgust
text: I felt disgust when I saw a friend walking in stagnant water without putting on gum boots.

label: shame
text: Went to a lecture about Chinese history and hear about the Opium War.

label: disgust
text: The first time I saw a pornographic film, all that in practice is so beautiful but on the screen appered as something mechanical, irrational, disgusting and dehumanizing.

label: joy
text: Receiving a postcard form my sweetheart who was abroad on vacation, not being at all sure if he would write me or not.

label: disgust
text: On my way home in the middle of the night I saw a drunk man and a woman who were quarreling, beating each other, shouting and so on. I felt disgusted especially because they treated each other in such a degrading way.

label: fear
text: When my sister had the still born child, she was emotionally very deep down, and it took her a long time to recover.

label: joy
text: Receiving my result slip (pass) on my birthday.

label: fear
text: When cleaning up a pile of junk under our house, a huge spider (a "Jungle Spider") ran out near me. (I do not like even small spiders).

label: disgust
text: Negative statement concerning me of a friend before strangers.

label: disgust
text: Someone vomited on the street.

label: anger
text: When my sister came home late one day and thus disobeyed my parents.

label: guilt
text: When I masturbated in my room.

label: anger
text: A colleague asked me for some advice and as he did not have enough confidence in me he asked a third person.

label: sadness
text: When I am at home alone.

label: anger
text: I gave some personal information to a friend of mine, and he told it to some others who were implicated in the affair.

label: guilt
text: I felt very guilty when a student, sitting in front of me in the exam, asked me a few questions and I did not show him the answers,  though I knew them.

label: disgust
text: Somebody went around spreading news that I like people with money.

label: sadness
text: When I feel lonely, perhaps because I have to study a lot and I am shut up in my appartment.  Nothing happens in particular because there is no time for anything else.

label: shame
text: I had a habit of wetting my bed when I was young.  One day, when I was invited to my friend's place to stay for the night, it happened again.  I was ashamed of myself.

label: shame
text: Somebody who knows me very well discovered that I had told him a lie.

label: shame
text: When I was 10 years old I stained our bench with a fountain-pen, I tried to twin the cushions, but then there were colour nuances. Then my mother catched me, she saw it and became very angry.

label: shame
text: I felt ashamed of my body in spite of knowing that it is more or less beautiful and also knowing that my boyfriend considers me beautiful, but this was only in the beginning.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilt to have come back from home without seeing my father. When I went home he was at work.

label: disgust
text: When I saw a girl in my economics discussion section smiling and asking stupid questions to the TA. just to get attention. She was obviously ass-kissing. It happens in every Econ. discussion held weekly.

label: fear
text: At the tender age of eleven a friend and I left a party and proceeded to walk through dark and secluded streets of a bad neighborhood to find a telephone (recent spate of Horror Movie watching had occurred).

label: guilt
text: I was of the opinion that 12.00 pm was too early to be back at home after going out, so I stayed away longer, knowing that my mother would be worried.

label: joy
text: The day the Real Madrid team of basket ball qualified for the final at Athens.

label: disgust
text: On Reperbahn, in a restaurant, a "charming" old saleswoman came to beg a drink for herself.

label: sadness
text: When I was in lower six class during the Summer I joined a research group of the Chinese university student union.  I knew a lot of CV students there.  A year later one of them was travelling in mainland China and he got T.B.  He died a few weeks after coming back to H.K.  We all got together for the funeral and when I looked at the body for the last time I felt extremely sad.

label: joy
text: I thought that I had failed an examination, but when I was informed about the mark, I saw that I had passed it.

label: shame
text: Feeling inadequate in a group situation, being unable to convey my own thoughts and feelings.

label: guilt
text: That I didn't want my friend to leave on holiday for 10 days because I thought I would miss him. I was constantly trying to persuade him.

label: guilt
text: Not to have studied enough when exams were near.

label: disgust
text: I saw a dog who was eating excrements.

label: disgust
text: When I read about or think about environmental pollution, the armor race, starvation, etc. Then one realizes that mankind is bad, most important is power and money, at the cost of nature and mankind.

label: sadness
text: When you are far away from relatives and friends. I feel sad for my early years, for the freedom and the carefree years of childhood.

label: joy
text: When I received my promotion letter.

label: fear
text: When mother was very ill, I feared that she would die.

label: joy
text: When my special friend said "I love you" for the first time.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother died. I had a very deep relation to her (I lived with her for several years).

label: sadness
text: When my uncle died I saw a funeral for the first time. All people stood around the open grave and cried.

label: guilt
text: I forgot about a close relatives's birthday.

label: shame
text: When I was a child, I had a medical check-up. I had to undress myself and was examined by several doctors.

label: fear
text: I was driving on to a busy freeway during rush hour and it was slightly raining. A diesel truck was coming very close behind me and I was close behind a pick-up. I changed lanes and barely hit the truck and ran a Honda of the road. I was scared to death to go back and see if I caused him to crash.

label: joy
text: I was very happy when I discovered that I had passed my first year examination and was among the thirty students who would major in economics.

label: anger
text: I am a school teacher.  One of the classes does not obey me at all, keeps on talking, does no work.  One afternoon, everything went wrong, and I got exceedingly angry.

label: sadness
text: My best friend could not get into university.

label: joy
text: After several days delay in my girlfriend's menstration I was very glad to see that the pregnancy test was negative.

label: guilt
text: When I shout at a colleague in classroom.

label: fear
text: I was caught doing something I was not supposed to do.  I did something with the person who caught me (bribe) and even though he promised not to report me, I am still frightened.

label: anger
text: Bought something bad from the shop and they refused to change it.

label: fear
text: I was working at a certain place and everyday after work dad would come to pick me up.  One day he did not come, it started getting very dark and I had no money on me and my home was very, very far away.

label: sadness
text: The death of an animal we had reared.

label: shame
text:
When I began to date, the first gestures of affection made me feel ashamed.
sadness,"Sitting in a bus, I heard behind, the voice of a girl I was friendly with. After her talking for some time with another girl I decided it wasn't her in fact that someone miming her, which it was when I finally looked. I was talking to a friend at the time.

label: fear
text: We were on the road in a car when a lorry bypassed us.  We had to swerve and we almost got run over.

label: sadness
text: China can not even give you good sound systems for an open lecture.

label: disgust
text: My mother was very angry with my little sister and told her to put her hands on the table in order to beat her hands up. She forced by means of her power.

label: sadness
text: When I applied for a job which I thought I had a good chance of getting, I was not even granted an interview and did not get the job.

label: disgust
text: When I found out that someone close to me was flirting around.

label: sadness
text: It was in the evening when I heard that my girl went to Zambia and that she would never come back.

label: fear
text: When confronted and in my opinion hassled by the police.

label: shame
text: This happens to me when I am not prepared in a given subject.

label: joy
text: Getting sent on a company expense trip to another state to work for a week at that plan.

label: fear
text: Once as a child I dreamed of a fire. Since that time I hadn't wanted to sleep in that bed and had feared the night darkness (and so it is now).

label: sadness
text: To say goodbye to dear friends after the holidays.

label: joy
text: I'm glad when I have good relations with my colleagues and most of all when we are at a party.

label: joy
text: Getting a letter from a friend who did not write for a long time.

label: joy
text: I was feeling really low - had been a series of fights with my siblings, been under pressure at school and wasn't going to the party I wanted to go - instead I was going out with my family. A guy called and said, in effect, that I was "nice" and he liked me. Hence the emotional joy.

label: disgust
text: A teacher was very blunt in his relation to a child so that the child was very upset when arriving at home.

label: sadness
text: An uncle of mine who just retired, having worked hard all his life, got a cerebral hemorrhage.

label: shame
text: When I confessed to my girl-friend (now my wife) that I had betrayed her with another woman.

label: disgust
text: When I went home by train from Sicilia, I was molested by a man.

label: anger
text: When someone stole my bike.

label: guilt
text: When my father (physically handicapped) asks me to do something and I raise several objections. Often I can fix it in few moments.

label: sadness
text: Close relative is dying of cancer - found out last week.

label: anger
text: When I was mistakenly accused of being a thief when I accidently gave a fake coin at a counter.  I realized this before I handed over the coin, but the man called me a thief and called a witness.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother after staying with us for awhile went back home.

label: anger
text: I was the compere at a party and all my efforts to get the show rolling were thwarted by the immobile, non co-operative guests.  I felt frustation - bordering on anger.

label: shame
text: I felt ashamed when I fought with my mother on some issue, and caused her trouble.

label: guilt
text: I wanted to finish a relationship after 3 months. Unfortunately my friend had a different opinion. I could not answer his feelings this made him unhappy, and me feel guilty.

label: disgust
text: Maltreatment of children.

label: sadness
text: When my gradmother died.  I felt very sad then ... The feeling started to be worse after a while.

label: shame
text: The day after the night I drank too much at a party.

label: guilt
text: The first time that I "played with myself" despite being a Christian.  I had read in the bible that it was wrong to make love to someone one is not married to.

label: fear
text: I am afraid if I'll finish the term.

label: sadness
text: When my friend did not pass the high school graduation examinations.

label: joy
text: When I passed the whole weekend with my boyfriend, coming back home on Sunday afternoon he met my parents for the first time.

label: joy
text: I was given a gift by my sister. There were many pleasant things in this parcel.

label: sadness
text: Watching an old lady running up the street to catch her bus and miss it, it reminded me of my own mother and how dreadful it would be to be her in the same situation.

label: disgust
text: A person that eat half of a cockroach in a cake without knowing it.

label: fear
text: When I was at a boarding school at Lusaka, the Rhodesian soldiers came to bomb a house near our school and we saw the whole scene.

label: fear
text: When a man who had a knife grabbed me and threatened me with it,   during my holidays in Monze.

label: disgust
text: When one of my parents verbally, personally abused the other.

label: sadness
text: When I got to know that my father had passed away.

label: guilt
text: When I was caught with another man's wife.  I had taken the opportuinty as this man was abroad but he returned that night.

label: fear
text: When I saw a TV program on the North American military plan called "The startwar".

label: joy
text: When I received the acceptance letter from UNZA.  I had just come home from work when my kind sister handed me an enveloppe which I opened and was overcome with joy.

label: sadness
text: I was going to go on a vacation to Texas this summer but was unable to go because of registration.

label: disgust
text: My roommate being nice to a party leader in order to get into the party.

label: shame
text: I once felt shame when I failed to fulfil the promise to marry a daughter of a certain gentleman.

label: joy
text: A good report card (a scholarship) in primary school.

label: joy
text: When I heard that I had passed the second year exams.

label: joy
text: When I found out that I had passed the last two exams by a margin of three marks.

label: shame
text: A conflict with a pupil and there were probatory teachers present.

label: fear
text: Telling my parents that I did not well in an examn.

label: disgust
text: I witnessed a scene in which two women were abusing each other.

label: shame
text: When I bought new clothes and put them on.

label: fear
text: Doing anatomy alone for the first time.

label: joy
text: I experienced joy when I got the results - I had made it to the second year.

label: disgust
text: I have an adopted Aboriginal sister I felt disgust due to the racism she has been subjected to.

label: shame
text: When I failed Psychology examination when most of the students passed.

label: joy
text: When I had my four children.

label: sadness
text: My son's mother told me that she wanted to move to Vienna and take the child with her. This means a rather long distance for me. My whole family was sad and dumbfounded so that my own feelings were intensified.

label: sadness
text: Not getting the reference paper.

label: disgust
text: I was an instructior in a youth organization.  Whenever we, the instructors would have a meeting the advisor would be present.  He did not understand our worknig conditions but talked a lot and had a lot of outdated ideas.  Whenever we disagreed with him he was very discontent and said that we had a prejudice against him.  Why did he have to treat us as his subordinates ?

label: disgust
text: When I was an auxiliary nurse at the hospital and I had to change the nappies, for the first time, of a very old and sick woman.

label: sadness
text: When I learnt that I had been betrayed by my friend.

label: fear
text: When they tried to rob me.

label: guilt
text: When I don't fulfill my obligations.

label: fear
text: I had gone for a medical check-up at the U.T.H and failed to make it back on time for the C119 practical sessions at 1400 hours last academic year.

label: guilt
text: When my father told me that I should help my mother more often, because she was so busy. And I realized that he was right.

label: fear
text: When a drunkard barged into a room where my friend and I had run in order to get away from him.  We were all alone and all I could see was this hand coming towards me.

label: disgust
text: A tiresome person held me up all day long.  I was very busy then (I can not remember what the problem was).  He continously tried to make me talk to him and disturbed me.

label: fear
text: The first day that I was close to a dead body, in my third year at UNZA, school of medicine.

label: anger
text: Landlord putting up rents sneakly and slimily.

label: sadness
text: Breaking up with a girl.

label: anger
text: A friend doesn't let me study when I want to. She doesn't feel I need to study and doesn't understand how important studying is to me. I get very angry with her.

label: guilt
text: After confronting the person who stood me up, I blew up and said all the wrong things.

label: guilt
text: I left a boy with whom I was going around without giving him any explanations.

label: disgust
text: I watched the news at the TV, it was a commentary about "Hainburg". I felt disgusted when I heard members of the union speak about the situation.

label: shame
text: I put my head into the pullover of a girl to see her breasts. The girl looked at me so that I felt ashamed.

label: shame
text: In primary school I once faltered while answering a question and the others started laughing.

label: joy
text: When the girl with whom I am in love smiles at me.

label: guilt
text: After closing the front door I realized that I had left the key inside the house. I felt even more guilty since it was not my own house but the house of people I hardly knew.

label: fear
text: In the morning just before going to the dentist.

label: guilt
text: I was in a sanatorium. In front of me a boy fell down from his invalid's chair. I could help him but I didn't. I felt like being paralysed.

label: guilt
text: I did not go to help a friend of mine, though she probably needed me.

label: fear
text: When I stayed alone in a house in Great Brittain and there was a lot of rumour in the newspaper about a murderer still being free.

label: shame
text: When a soppy poem that I had written to a boy was found and every one read it and started teasing me about it.

label: joy
text: When I got permission to study at a place which was far away from my home.

label: shame
text: Insulted by classmate in public.

label: anger
text: When a close relative is treated badly.

label: anger
text: After a long trip in my dad's van without incident I stopped to fill the tank with gas and dented the side of the van against the pole. Then my cars electrical system would not work when I tried to drive home from his house.

label: guilt
text: I feel always guilty before my parents when I come home and have to tell them I have failed an exam.

label: guilt
text: When I realized that I avoided two good friends with whom I always shared toys and sorrows. I made up idle stories to avoid telling them what happened to me.

label: joy
text: I have a new born child.

label: guilt
text: When I was forced to decline the invitation to my mother's 70th birthday because of my work committments in another area.

label: joy
text: When the church choir came one Sunday after being away for some weeks.

label: joy
text: When a study tour got confirmed, I was happy all the time till    the tour began.

label: disgust
text: At what I was capable of of selfishly using others for sexual encounters, while I held a vision of having a deepening above-board (you know, "girl next door") devotion to a girl in my head. My drives and actions did not match this so consequently I felt disgusted at my failure.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty about going out when I should have been studying for a presentation I had to give on Wednesday the next week.

label: guilt
text: When I was baby-sitting at my cousin's place, I tried to have a pleasant time and did not really take care of the child.  I do not care very much about children.

label: shame
text: I can't remember ever feeling shame.

label: disgust
text: I felt disgust when I realized that I had eaten something fatty, and vomited too much.

label: shame
text: I overreacted towards my mother and felt ashamed afterwards.

label: sadness
text: When my gradmother died.

label: guilt
text: Not doing something I had promised.

label: disgust
text: When my friend who is close to me got engaged and did not invite me.

label: anger
text: At an undeserved attitude toward a man, when human personality is not treated decently.

label: joy
text: I was admitted to the University and a niece was born to me.

label: sadness
text: The inability to read a book at college.

label: sadness
text: When I noticed that my parents were not in such a prosperity as most people in my surroundings.

label: sadness
text: After the loss of a close relative.

label: joy
text: I was coming home from an exam and I supposed that I had passed it so I ran to a restaurant for a beer.

label: disgust
text: I visited a place in Morocco where they worked the leather.  I saw the skins emerged in a liquid which ressembled putrification.

label: disgust
text: People who came to our home - and requested "Put out your smoke". That we should not smoke in our house... and asked not even politely. It disgusted me because I think people need to adapt to the situation.

label: disgust
text: When I had exams a relative of ours, who lives in another city,came to visit us and I felt disgusted at him.

label: guilt
text: At one time while at primary school I lost a pencil case of a friend and I didn't mention it to her until after a fortnight.

label: fear
text: Fear to come and live in Nijmegen.

label: joy
text: For about one year I had a rather bad relation with my father. Last Christmas Eve he invited me to stay withhim and I was very glad about it. It was a fine evening.

label: joy
text: I felt joy when I red my name in the list of the approved in the entrance college examination.

label: anger
text: Disagreements with mother.  When I moved from KankaanpSS, she had promised to help me move but broke her promise because of some hindrance.

label: guilt
text: A kitten had wandered into our office, and I was told to take it back across the street. When I crossed back, the kitten followed me and was run over and killed by a car.

label: guilt
text: One time I felt guilty when I told one of my previous boyfriends we were through just because I never felt like having one at that particular time.

label: sadness
text: Day time robbery of our house.

label: shame
text: Watching TV about china is behind in winning gold medals.

label: joy
text: Finding out I was chosen for the English lectures.

label: disgust
text: This is difficult, since I don't remember feeling disgust towards anyone.

label: guilt
